snippet: Deborah A. Farrington of StarVest Partners says that in advising chief executives, she watches for their ability to understand where they are succeeding — and where they are not.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with StarVest founder and partner Deborah Farrington discussing her career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Deborah A. Farrington of StarVest Partners says that in advising chief executives, she watches for their ability to understand where they are succeeding — and where they are not.

headline.print_headline: C.E.O. or Not, You Always Need Feedback
headline.seo: Deborah Farrington of StarVest, on Evaluating C.E.O.’s
headline.main: C.E.O. or Not, You Always Need Feedback
